name: Captain! (itch)
description:
This is a short game created in 48 hours all by myself for Chips n Jam.

The goal of this (quiet hard!) game is to survive 20 days in the open sea while struggling with all sort of occuring events (mermaid encounter/hygiene issues/jellyfish stings etc.).

Keep your Morale, Crew, Hygiene and Ship at high level because the sea is wide and full of unexpectable!

Controls: 

Menu: Up/Down button + Enter to confirm

Left/Right button to see the options

Space button to confirm the selected option

R to restart

The theme of the game jam was " Deck ".

There were also 5 different modifiers as additional limitations, but I decided to avoid using those.

In this game I tried to recreate the mechanics of Reigns game and create tons of little scenarios.
